articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Egyptian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Egyptian President
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to Egyptian President Muhammad Hosni Mubarak in connection with terrorist bombing that occurred in Alexandria City, killing or wounding many innocent people.
					Kim in the message expressed deep condolences and sympathy to the President and, through him, to the victims and bereaved families, and solidarity with the Egyptian government and people in their efforts to promote social stability and unity under the leadership of the President.

articles.title: New Year Editorial Reiterates DPRK's Will for Denuclearization
articles.content:
New Year Editorial Reiterates DPRK's Will for Denuclearization
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is consistent in its stand and will to achieve peace in Northeast Asia and the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula. This position of the DPRK was manifested by the joint editorial issued by its leading newspapers on the occasion of the New Year.
					 What happened in the world last year shows that the imperialists' high-handedness and arbitrariness can no longer work and that nothing can check the trend of the present times towards independence. 
					
					 The Songun (military-first) politics pursued by the DPRK to ensure peace in the Korean peninsula and the rest of Asia reflects the progressive people's desire to build a new world, independent and peaceful.
					
					 The DPRK's powerful war deterrent has successfully frustrated the imperialists' attempt to dominate the world by dint of nuclear weapons. It is also a token of the Korean people's strong will to make the peninsula free from nuclear weapons.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever strive to develop relations of friendship and cooperation with countries that are friendly towards it and achieve global independence under the ideals of independence, peace and friendship, the editorial emphasized.

articles.title: Slogan for Reunification and Prosperity
articles.content:
Slogan for Reunification and Prosperity
						
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Greeting the new year, the Korean people are resolved to redouble their efforts for the improvement of the relations between the north and the south of Korea and the reunification of the country. They want to make the second of the 21st century a decade of reunification and prosperity.
					 Despite the obstruction of the separatists within and without, the 10th anniversary of the June 15 Joint Declaration and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo were commemorated significantly in the north, south and abroad last year, powerfully demonstrating the ardent desire of the nation for the reunification.
					
					 It is thanks to the DPRK's Songun (military-first) politics based on patriotism and its persevering efforts that a war was deterred on the Korean peninsula and the pro-reunification movement of the nation made a steady progress.
					
					 It is high time that the entire nation turned out in the effort to prevent a war and ensure peace on the peninsula, providing an atmosphere of dialogue and cooperation between the two halves of the country with the common interests of the nation placed above anything else.
					
					 "Let all Koreans in the north, south and abroad join efforts and bring a new phase of independent reunification!" -- this is a slogan the Korean people should hold high in this year's effort for the reunification, peace and prosperity of the nation.

articles.title: New Dolmen Discovered
articles.content:
New Dolmen Discovered 
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- A dolmen which was discovered recently in Unchon County, South Hwanghae Province, has drawn interest of archaeologists as it is of unusual structure. 
					 Called Jongdong-ri dolmen No.5, it was found on the ridge of Mang Hill in Jongdong-ri.
					
					 A rectangular stone cover, 210cm long, 120cm wide and 40cm thick, shows up above the ground, with six grooves forming a constellation on its surface.
					
					 The underground chamber consists of a flat bottom stone, long upright stones in the south and north and small upright stones in the east and west. 
					
					 The two long stones were reinforced with cobbles from outside at their two-thirds height. The small stone in the east was erected 35cm inside from the end of the long ones and that in the west was set up at the end of the long ones.
					
					 It is likely that the west stone was used as an entrance.
					
					 The new discovery represents the period of the transition from the dolmen modeled on Chimchon-ri dolmen to those on Odok-ri dolmen.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates an article to the 19th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party."
					 The work, published on January 3, Juche 81 (1992), clarifies the basic reason why socialism collapsed in some countries at that time and the inevitability of victory of Korean-style socialism based on the Juche idea. 
					
					 Every paragraph of the work is consistent with Kim Jong Il's iron will to accomplish the socialist cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung by holding fast to the general line of the Party on building socialism, the article says, adding:
					
					 He has always led the socialist cause of Juche to victory. The wisdom of his guidance can be found in that he has vigorously advanced the revolution and construction by dint of ideology under the uplifted banner of attaching importance to it.   
					
					 By keeping up the Juche theory of ideology, he has trained all the soldiers and people to be persons strong in ideology and faith while leading Korean-style socialism to victory.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have been firmly armed with the Juche idea, the Songun idea under his wise leadership 
					
					 It is a true picture of Songun Korea that the Korean People's Army serves as mainstay and turned into strong and elite armed forces, creating miracles one after another in defending socialism and building a thriving nation.
					
					 Unshakable is the revolutionary faith of the Korean army and people adhering to the basic principle of socialism as they hold in high esteem Kim Jong Il, stalwart defender of socialism. They have worked ceaseless miracles and feats in the ongoing drive to build a thriving nation, keeping their feet planted on their own land and looking out over the world. Their indomitable faith and will bring about the radical changes in every part of the country.

articles.title: S. Korea Censured for Confrontation and War Moves
articles.content:
S. Korea Censured for Confrontation and War Moves
Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Recently the Defense Ministry of south Korea issued a "whitepaper on defence" in which it stipulated that the "government and army in the north are the enemy of the south". Meanwhile the military bellicose forces conducted provocative naval firing exercises again in 23 spots of the East, West and South Seas of Korea with huge armed forces involved at the end of last year.
					 Commenting on the facts, a news analyst of Rodong Sinmun, a major newspaper of the DPRK, Tuesday says:
					
					 They are an open denial to the improvement of north-south relations and a vivid expression of the south Korean authorities' persistent design for invasion of the DPRK.
					
					 They are still running toward confrontation and war despite the protest of people at home and abroad. This is not a demonstration of the strong but a last-ditch effort of the weak.
					
					 Such behaviors show that they have already gone out of their mind and are preoccupied utterly by persecution mania.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the south Korean bellicose forces are a dangerous group of traitors who might unhesitatingly provoke a war against the DPRK in a bid to prolong their remaining days.
					
					 They are advised to behave themselves, mindful that confrontation and war will bring earlier their own doom.
					
					 They will be held entirely accountable for the consequences to be entailed by their moves against the trend of times toward the improved north-south relations, peace and reunification.

articles.title: S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign Denounced
Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Human Rights Committee made the "stop to human rights abuses" in the north its top priority target till 2012 in its recent "three-phase policy road map" for "improved human rights in the north," according to Minju Joson Tuesday. 
					 The committee set an aim to set up "human rights protection system" by 2015 and push forward the "formation of human rights organization and independent judicial body" in the long term, a by-lined commentary of the paper said, adding:
					
					 The road map envisages the control of the "human rights issue in the north" by the puppet prime minister's office and its sponsor of a meeting of foreign ambassadors to Seoul to build international public opinion, support the human rights bodies and intensify broadcasting and spreading of leaflets against the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet administration has so far egged riff-raffs on to do harm to the DPRK. Now it is mulling launching more vicious anti-DPRK human rights campaign than before. This indicates the conservative regime's hysteric escalation of confrontation with its fellow countrymen.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the south Korean regime is not in a position to talk about other's human rights.
					
					 It has seriously violated the rights of south Koreans since its seizure of power. 
					
					 It forced the people to leave their home in midwinter and sent police who committed violence against displaced protesters and burnt them to death. 
					
					 The prime minister's office was recently revealed to have inspected civilians in secrecy, sparking big political furor.
					
					 The committee, however, is working hard to do harm to the fellow countrymen while turning away from those human rights abuses.
					
					 If the regime has an iota of conscience, it should repent of turning south Korea into the land with poor human rights record and the tundra of democracy and show concern for protecting people's rights.

articles.title: Japan's Sycophantic Attitude to US Assailed
articles.content:
Japan's Sycophantic Attitude to US Assailed
Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson, a leading newspaper of the DPRK, today criticizes Japan for its sycophantic attitude toward the U.S. over the relocation of the U.S. military airfield in Futenma.
					When visiting Okinawa Prefecture recently Prime Minister of Japan Naoto Kan said that he "apologizes" for the failed transfer of the U.S. Futenma airfield outside the prefecture and feels ashamed to show himself to the people in the prefecture.
					
					Meanwhile, Chief Cabinet Secretary Sengoku underlined the "significance" of the U.S. military base in Okinawa. And he tried to convince the inhabitants of the transfer of the military base within the prefecture, saying that they would ask for the prefecture's "acceptance" to bear the expenses for the base and that it is unavoidable for the prefecture to share the expenses.
					
					Commenting on the facts, the newspaper says:
					
					The Japanese authorities are ridiculed by the world people as an incompetent political dwarf kowtowing to the U.S.
					
					When the ruling Democratic Party of Japan bluffed that it would turn the U.S.-Japan relations into "horizontal" from "vertical" the world people had dismissed it as a boast of indiscreet Japan.
					
					Down through generations, Japan has asked the U.S. for "its security" while offering its territory as military bases for the U.S.
					
					That is why Japan can not express its own view, browbeaten by the U.S., even in international arena.
					
					The authorities of Japan, therefore, become a butt of the world people's ridicule, as it has to maintain itself by sycophancy and yielding to the U.S.
					
					This is an inevitable fate of Japan, a servant of the U.S.

articles.title: DPRK to Improve Relations with Any Country that Respects Sovereignty
articles.content:
DPRK to Improve Relations with Any Country that Respects Sovereignty
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is willing to improve and normalize relations even with those countries that had been in hostile relations with it, if they repeal their hostile policy toward it and respect its sovereignty and dignity, said Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article Tuesday.
					 Independence, peace and friendship are avowed idea of foreign policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government, the article said, adding:
					
					 The joint New Year editorial specified this idea again, an indication of their revolutionary will to remain true to it.
					
					 The DPRK, a country of international prestige, has developed relations of friendship, cooperation and good-neighborliness with many countries.
					
					 It has advocated independence in relations with foreign countries.
					
					 It is a fundamental principle and mode of activities of the WPK and the DPRK government in making revolution and construction to judge every issue independently and solve it according to its faith.
					
					 The DPRK has actively supported the just cause of people of those countries respecting others' sovereignty and advocating independence.
					
					 The Korean people will always hold high the banner of peace and work hard in solidarity with world peace-loving people to defend peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world from the imperialists' aggression and war moves.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK government and the unanimous desire and wish of humankind to develop friendly and cooperative relation with all the countries desirous of independence.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Opening New Phase of Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Opening New Phase of Independent Reunification
						
  Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- "Let all Koreans in the north, south and abroad join efforts and bring a new phase of independent reunification!" This is a slogan set forth in the joint New Year editorial.
					 The slogan reflects the firm faith in the united efforts of the Korean nation, driving force for national reunification, and bright future of the nation to be shaped by them, said Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article Tuesday.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should turn out in the patriotic drive for independent reunification true to the militant slogan to fulfill the responsibility and duty they have assumed before the nation, said the article, adding:
					
					 This patriotic slogan reflects the desire and will of the Koreans and the requirement of the times.
					
					 The most urgent task in defending and realizing independence of the nation is to reunify the divided country as soon as possible.
					
					 For the Koreans, reunification precisely means patriotism.
					
					 The basic duty for them this year is to bring a new phase of independent reunification. 
					
					 No one can replace the Korean nation in reunifying the country and its wisdom, will and strength serve as a source for ushering in the bright dawn of reunification.
					
					 Every Korean should dedicate strength, contribute knowledge and donate money, anything he or she has, for reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for High-pitched Drive for Improving People's Living
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for High-pitched Drive for Improving People's Living 
Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- The joint New Year editorial of the DPRK set forth tasks to spur the light industrial sector once again this year to bring about a decisive turn in improving the people's standard of living and building a thriving nation.
					 All the Korean people should speed up the general onward march for a final victory in the ongoing drive, says Rodong Sinmun in an editorial Tuesday.
					
					 The militant tasks to accelerate the development of light industry are a blueprint of victory which can be put forth only by the Workers' Party of Korea, a party providing a firm guarantee for improving the people's standard of living, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 Those tasks reflect the matchless pluck and spirit of the army and the people of the DPRK that no fortress is unconquerable as they are led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 This year we should make redoubled efforts to demonstrate the spirit and honor of Songun Korea emerging a thriving nation by the tremendous might of single-minded unity.
					
					 All the people should carry through the militant tasks in their sectors and units in the same faith, mettle and practical abilities as displayed by the workers of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex.
					
					 We should have the intense loyalty and will to carry into reality the leader's plan and intention without fail.
					
					 The tasks facing the Korean people are very big, but this year's general onward march is sure to emerge victorious as there are the tested leadership of Kim Jong Il, the tremendous mental power of the army and people ready to devotedly carry out any decision of the Party, indestructible military strength and solid foundation of the independent economy.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of Justice Supported in Syria
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of Justice Supported in Syria
Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Syria supports the Korean people's cause of justice.
					 Saaeed Eleia Dawood, director of the Organizational Department of the Regional Leadership of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party, stressed this on December 23 last year when he met Choe Su Hon, DPRK ambassador to his country.
					
					He, chairman of the Syrian Arab-Korea Friendship Association, noted that the friendly and cooperative relations between the peoples of the two countries are favorably developing day by day under the guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and President Bashar Al-Assad.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 The Syrian people will always support the Korean people in their struggle against the maneuvers of the U.S.
					
					 The recent joint military exercises staged by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities in the West Sea of Korea are a provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The will of the Korean people to defend the sovereignty of the country is more powerful than any weapon, and any sanctions and blockade will become impotent before it.
					
					 It is a very urgent task and demand of the international community to achieve peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Russians to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Russians to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee of Russian public circles was formed in Moscow on Dec. 28 last year to celebrate February 16 this year, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Vladimir Tolstikov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events of various forms including meeting, seminar, photo exhibition and film show.

articles.title: Desnuclearizacion y paz son la invariable voluntad de la RPDC
articles.content:
Desnuclearizacion y paz son la invariable voluntad de la RPDC
						
  Pyongyang, 4 de enero (ATCC) -- El editorial conjunto publicado en Corea con motivo del Ano Nuevo refleja la invariable posicion y voluntad del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de preservar la paz en el Nordeste Asiatico y desnuclearizar toda la Peninsula Coreana.
					  Lo ocurrido el pasado ano en la palestra internacional muestra que nunca pueden ser aceptables la coercion y la arbitrariedad de los imperialistas y con nada sera posible detener la corriente de la epoca hacia la independencia.
					
					  En la politica de Songun de Corea, que defiende la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de Asia, esta presente la aspiracion de la humanidad progresista a construir un nuevo mundo independiente y pacifico.
					
					  El poderoso disuasivo de guerra de Corea del Songun, que frustra sin piedad la ambicion y el intento de los imperialistas de tomar la heguemonia del mundo y desatar la guerra nuclear, muestra bien la invariable voluntad del pueblo coreano de realizar a toda costa la desnuclearizacion de esa Peninsula.
					
					  En lo adelante, el pueblo coreano se esforzara con teson por desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con los paises que, bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad, tratan amistosamente con Corea, y por verificar la independencia en el mundo.

articles.title: Decada de 2010 por la reunificacion y la prosperidad
articles.content:
Decada de 2010 por la reunificacion y la prosperidad
 Pyongyang, 4 de enero (ATCC) -- En el Ano Nuevo 2011, el pueblo coreano esta dispuesto a convertir la nueva decada del siglo 21 en la de reunificacion y prosperidad intensificando la lucha por el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion de la patria.
					  Pese a las siniestras maquinaciones de los divisionistas internos y externos, en el Norte, el Sur de Corea y en ultramar fueron conmemorados significativamente el 10o aniversario de publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el 30o  aniversario de presentacion del Proyecto de la Fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo.
					
					  La detencion de la guerra y el avance vigoroso del movimiento nacional por la reunificacion de la patria en la Peninsula Coreana se deben a la patriotica politica de Songun y a los esfuerzos pacientes del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Ahora, toda la nacion coreana debe movilizarse en la lucha contra la guerra y por la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y hacer ingentes esfuerzos por crear el clima de conversaciones y colaboracion entre el Norte y el Sur poniendo en el primer plano los intereses comunes de la nacion.
					
					  El pueblo coreano hara brillar 2011 como el ano orgulloso de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad luchando con la consigna "!Con la fuerza unida de todos los compatriotas del Norte, el Sur y el extranjero, abramos una nueva coyuntura para la reunificacion independiente!"

articles.title: Socialismo coreano avanza victorioso bajo la guia del PTC
articles.content:
Socialismo coreano avanza victorioso bajo la guia del PTC
Pyongyang, 4 de enero (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto en su edicion de hoy un articulo dedicado al 19o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Lecciones historicas de la construccion socialista y la linea general de nuestro partido".
					Esta obra publicada el 3 de enero del 81 (1992) de la Era Juche dilucida la causa fundamental del fracaso del socialismo en algunos paises en aquel entonces y argumenta la certeza de la victoria del socialismo coreano basado en la idea Juche, comienza el diario y continua:
					
					En cada parrafo de la obra se nota la ferrea voluntad del Dirigente Kim Jong Il de mantener firmemente la linea general del PTC sobre la construccion socialista y llevar a feliz termino la causa socialista del Juche iniciada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					La sabia orientacion del Dirigente, quien conduce a la victoria la causa socialista del Juche, se manifiesta en que el impulsa la revolucion y la construccion con el poderio de la ideologia concediendo mayor importancia a esta. 
					
					Segun su autoctona doctrina ideologica, el Dirigente forma a todos los militares y civiles como los armados con la idea Juche, la del Songun y como los fuertes en la conviccion.
					
					Las filas revolucionarias cuyo pilar es el EPC se han convertido en las unidades de flor y nata y crean milagros sucesivos en la defensa del socialismo y la construccion de la gran potencia prospera, esto es el verdadero aspecto de la Corea del Songun. 
					
					Gracias al Dirigente, defensor resuelto del socialismo, se hizo inconmovible la conviccion revolucionaria de nuestro ejercito y pueblo que mantienen hoy los principios fundamentales del socialismo. 
					
					La conviccion y voluntad indoblegables de los militares y civiles de Corea, que bajo la consigna de "!Los pies en el suelo patrio y la vista hacia el mundo!" crean incesantes milagros y meritos en la obra de construccion de la gran potencia prospera, son factores de grandes cambios que se reportan en todas partes de la patria.

articles.title: Minju Joson rechaza la "hoja de ruta" publicada en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson rechaza la "hoja de ruta" publicada en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 4 de enero (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el Comite de Derechos Humanos del Sur de Corea publico la llamada "hoja de ruta politica de tres etapas" para "mejorar la situacion de derechos humanos del Norte".
					Esa "hoja de ruta" toma por su meta inmediata "erradicar la violacion de DDHH" por alguien hasta el ano 2012 y consiste en establecer hasta el 2015 el "sistema de proteccion de DDHH" y promover a la larga la "fundacion de un aparato de DDHH y la independencia del poder judicial", etc.
					
					Segun ella, la oficina del premier titere surcoreano se hara cargo del "problema de DDHH del Norte" y lo ventilara en la opinion publica internacional al organizar un mecanismo de consulta de que formen parte los embajadores extranjeros en Seul. Igualmente, se brindara ayuda a las entidades de DDHH y se reanudaran la radiodifusion y el lanzamiento de volantes contra la RPDC.
					
					Al respecto, el rotativo Minju Joson publico hoy un comentario individual, que senala en particular:
					
					Hasta la fecha, la administracion titere surcoreana calumniaba a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por conducto de unos fulanos y menganos.
					
					Y ahora quiere lanzar la campana de DDHH anti-RPDC dando directamente su cara. Este hecho revela que la banda de conservadores surcoreanos esta enloquecida a mas no poder por el enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					
					Ellos no tienen cara para cuestionar el estado de derechos humanos de alguien.
					
					Despues de tomar el poder, violaron flagrantemente los derechos humanos de los habitantes. Por ejemplo, ordenaron a los policias armados usar la violencia y asesinar al fuego a los moradores que protestaban el desalojo forzado de sus hogares en pleno invierno.
					
					Hace poco, estallo un gran escandalo politico al revelarse que la oficina del premier titere surcoreano investigo en secreto a los civiles. 
					
					Sin embargo, el Comite titere de Derechos Humanos se dedica a censurar a los connacionales haciendo vista gorda del serio problema de DDHH de su casa. 
					
					Si la banda de conservadores tiene un poco de conciencia, debera reflexionar de su crimen de haber convertido el Sur de Corea en el infierno de DDHH y democracia y prestar debida atencion a la proteccion de DDHH de los habitantes surcoreanos.
